jcr:content.jcr:title: G300s - Shen Refresh
jcr:content.seoDescription: Nine programmable controls and three onboard profiles mean you can do more, faster. Learn more about Logitech Gaming.

media_tile.text: Achieve great results with the default configuration straight out of the box, or set up one-button triggers for actions that typically require digging into menus. Put push-to-talk communications in easier reach. Temporarily down-shift DPI. Reassign any game command or multi-command macro to any one of nine programmable buttons with Logitech Gaming Software (LGS).

media_tile_654806920.text: Versatile design in a compact shape, this mouse is built for comfort and durability. The balanced shape works for both left and right hands.

media_tile_777233576.text: Assign a unique color and identity to each user profile with up to seven color variations to know what settings are active during game play. Advanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

media_tile_842265300.text: On-the-fly DPI shifting lets you toggle between two sensitivity settings with a click, from pixel-precise 250 DPI targeting to speedy 2,500 DPI movement. Use LGS to customize the DPI settings to fit your style of play. Also, DPI cycling lets you choose from up to five DPI settings while in-game.

media_tile_200728518.text: Be confident that your every command is executed as quickly as possible. Up to eight times faster than a standard USB mouse, G300S captures your moves as fast as you can make them.

media_tile_200728518_1655643158.text: Our engineers thoroughly test and rate the primary buttons at 10 million clicks, and the feet of travel at 250 km. Able to survive the most intense gaming sessions, G300S will keep going right along with you.

media_tile_200728518_437751444.text: The low-friction polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) feet eliminate friction on nearly any surface for smoother motions, precise cursor movements and improved accuracy.

media_tile_200728518_2091337663.text: Use the optional LGS to perfectly setup commands for your favorite games. Simple drag-and-drop settings allow you to customize button and tracking profiles. Or use pre-configured customizations with automatic game detection.

media_tile_200728518_1531901764.text: When you take your G300S with you, your custom settings come along. By saving your preferences to the onboard memory using LGS you can use it on another PC with no need to install software or reconfigure your settings.

_x0033_.text: Max. acceleration: >20 GTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0034_.text: Max. speed: >150 IPSTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0035_.text: Internet access for Logitech Gaming Software (optional)
